title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 89.5 - Investment committee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 89.5 - Investment committee

State Regulations

No thrift institution shall make any investment, pursuant to
the provisions of section 235.30 or 379.5 of the Banking Law and the provisions
of this Part, without the prior establishment of a securities investment
committee of its board of trustees or directors, a majority of the members of
which committee shall not be officers or employees of the thrift
institution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
89.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
